subject: Re: [junit] Capturing the standard out of a program that I'm testing
msgSnippet: ... ByteArrayOutputStream newOut = new ByteArrayOutputStream(); System.setOut(new PrintStream(newOut)); Don t forget to System.out.flush() before getting the
messageBody:
--- "Chappell, Simon P" <simon.chappell@...> wrote:
> Does anyone have any examples of code that captures the standard out
> of
> a Java program.

ByteArrayOutputStream newOut = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
System.setOut(new PrintStream(newOut));

Don't forget to System.out.flush() before getting the data from newOut.

Regards,

Rob
